member.name: T:UnityEngine.XR.ARBackgroundRenderer
member.summary: Class used to override a camera's default background rendering path to instead render a given and/or . This will typically be used with images from the color camera for rendering the AR background on mobile devices.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.XR.ARRenderMode
member.summary: Enumeration describing the AR rendering mode used with .

member.name: P:UnityEngine.XR.ARBackgroundRenderer.backgroundTexture
member.summary: An optional used for AR rendering. If this property is not set then the texture set in as "_MainTex" is used.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.XR.ARBackgroundRenderer.camera
member.summary: An optional whose background rendering will be overridden by this class. If this property is not set then the main Camera in the scene is used.

member.name: P:UnityEngine.XR.ARBackgroundRenderer.mode
member.summary: When set to (default) the camera is not overridden to display the background image. Setting this property to will render the texture specified by and or as the background.

member.name: F:UnityEngine.XR.ARRenderMode.StandardBackground
member.summary: The standard background is rendered. (Skybox, Solid Color, etc.)

member.name: F:UnityEngine.XR.ARRenderMode.MaterialAsBackground
member.summary: The material associated with is being rendered as the background.
